EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on getting Challenge with Distinction!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
A massive congratulations on being awarded Challenge with Distinction for all your hard work over the last year. We'd love to invite you to get your certificate at graduation this December, the details are below:
Date: Saturday 6th December 2014 Time: 15:00 - 16:30 Location: Birmingham City FC, St. Andrews Stadium, Cattell Rd, Birmingham, West Midlands B9 4RL
Please come in smart dress like you did for your graduation last year, unfortunately due to restricted seating we ask that you don't bring guests. If you are unable to attend we can send you your certificate in the mail, please just let us know.
Huge congratulations again!
The Challenge Society
